Harley Gauge Mods

Modding Your Harley Davidson Gauges
From boring amber into something much more modern looking and easier to read
Please see more examples on our Facebook page

Contact Us

About Us

We modify the stock factory Harley gauges on 2004 on up models. For the 2004-2013 touring bikes, both your speedometer and tachometer need to be sent in. For the 2014 on up touring bikes, all 4 gauges need to be sent in. For bikes pre-2004, please contact me for more information.

2014 Street Glide Special in White with Blue needles and Blue radio buttons
2015 export khm Street Glide in Red with Blue
2012 Titanum spun gauge in Blue with Red needle
2010 Electra Glide in Red with White
2013 Road Glide in Green with White
2012 Street Glide tach in Red with White
2013 Street Glide in all Blue and 2012 Street Glide in all Red
2014 Ultra Classic in Red with White needle
2010 Wide Glide in Blue with Red needle
2008 Ultra Classic in Red with White and 2004 Ultra Classic in all Blue
2015 Road Glide in Blue with White
2013 Road Glide in Green with White
